attributes.action: Abolish Jobseekers allowance and Replace with a Government Sponsored Work Placement .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of simply being handed out dole, if a person becomes out of work, they still get paid - much like jobseekers allowance. However now they will earn it by working for 8 hours a week in their field, doing what they have been trained to do.

Business's will apply to accept placements, and provide a list of 'types' of people they can use.  For example, salesmen, production staff, drivers, admin, unskilled etc. 

Then when a person who is in that field,   becomes out of work - they get moved into to one of the Business's waiting for a placement.  All the business has to do is report back that the person is there working for them.

Advantages to this are:-

* The person out of work is gaining experience, and getting an oppurtunity to show off their skills to business's.

* They are not falling out of touch with current legislation and technology changes within their field.
